name: Slacks Attacks Mother Nature
description:
“Slacks attacks mother nature” is about different perspectives on jeans production and its effect on society, people and the environment. It’s a relatively short interactive fiction-style game.

This game is a part of a bachelor thesis in game development conducted by two students at the University of Skövde. Data will only be collected through a questionnaire after the end of the game. 

To participate, play the game and then answer the questionnaire which will be accessed through the game. Estimated time for the entire study is 45 min. You can contact us through the comments if you have any questions.

Feel free to share the game if you know someone who might be interested!
